author: Jacob Dressler
description:
The newest adaptation of the Street Fighter video game franchise is on the way – and the first official trailer has been released online. Fans have been looking forward to a more faithful take on the popular video game series, and if the footage below is any indication, then that seems to be the case [...]

The post First Trailer For Live-Action ‘Street Fighter’ Movie Released appeared first on ScreenGeek.
title: First Trailer For Live-Action ‘Street Fighter’ Movie Released
